tasks.name: Midterm exam
tasks.desc: In-class midterm with four short essay questions covering content from the first half of the course.

tasks.name: Tech critique memo
tasks.desc: Three-page critique of a digital platform after at least three days of use; includes evidence-based design/interface suggestions. (Due Mar 14 by 11:59 PM)

tasks.name: Final research paper
tasks.desc: Empirical paper (5â€“7 pages) requiring primary data collection (content analysis, surveys, interviews, or ethnography). (Due Apr 18 by 11:59 PM)

tasks.name: Exit tickets
tasks.desc: Quick 5-minute MyCourses quizzes given at end of class; each exit ticket worth 5% and two completed equal full 10%. Dates are random (administered three times per semester).
